lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to HTML

documents.title: What is HTML?
documents.description: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language and is the standard language for creating web pages.

documents.title: HTML Structure
documents.description: HTML documents have a structure that includes elements such as doctype, html, head, and body tags.

documents.title: Basic HTML Tags
documents.description:
Learn about basic HTML tags like

, ,

lessons.title: Lesson 2: HTML Elements

documents.title: HTML Elements Overview
documents.description: HTML elements are the building blocks of HTML pages. They are represented by tags.

documents.title: Inline vs Block Elements
documents.description: Understand the difference between inline and block elements in HTML.

documents.title: HTML Attributes
documents.description: HTML attributes provide additional information about HTML elements.

quiz.question: How do you add an attribute to an HTML tag?

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to CSS

documents.title: What is CSS?
documents.description: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets and is used to style and layout web pages.

documents.title: CSS Syntax
documents.description: Learn about the syntax of CSS including selectors, properties, and values.

documents.title: CSS Selectors
documents.description: CSS selectors are used to 'select' the HTML elements you want to style.

lessons.codingActivity: Create a basic CSS stylesheet and apply it to an HTML page.

quiz.question: How do you link a CSS file to an HTML document?

lessons.title: Lesson 2: CSS Properties

documents.title: Common CSS Properties
documents.description: Learn about common CSS properties like color, font, and border.

documents.title: Color and Background
documents.description: How to set colors and backgrounds in CSS.

documents.title: Box Model
documents.description: The CSS box model describes the rectangular boxes that are generated for elements in the document tree.

lessons.codingActivity: Style an HTML page using various CSS properties.

quiz.question: What is the box model in CSS?
How do you change the background color of an element in CSS?
